text:
We are working on the integration for org.apache.xmlgraphics:fop into Apache Camel. Because one of the the preferred runtime for Apache Camel is Apache ServiceMix/Apache Karaf, we need OSGI bundles instead of normal JAR files.

See: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CAMEL-3551

Don't hesitate to ask us, if you need help/support for this.

Best,
Christian
creator: christian.mueller@gmail.com
christian.mueller@gmail.com

Ok, thanks for the info.
If we could resolve the issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SMX4-963, I think it make sense to come back to this issue and discuss what we had to do to get it running in OSGI and what you may could provide out of the box in the future...
